trans-unit.source: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 與對等共同作業基礎結構互動。

trans-unit.source: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.
trans-unit.target: 許多核心共同作業的案例都是從這個類別開始的。

trans-unit.source: This class is a static class – it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別是靜態類別 – 它是密封、 抽象，而且沒有公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session.
trans-unit.target: 它用來包含和管理應用程式、 物件和對等體接受邀請給共同作業工作階段的目前狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 根據對等電腦、 物件和應用程式，PeerCollaboration 類別會提供三個存取子中，一個用於每個集合，做為介面或點的連線能力的其他任何發生在電腦上。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。如果這個密封的類別指定的基底類別，會發生編譯時期錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Methods and properties in this class can be used to:
trans-unit.target: 這個類別中方法和屬性可用來：

trans-unit.source: Launch and manage collaborative applications
trans-unit.target: 啟動及管理共同作業應用程式

trans-unit.source: Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions)
trans-unit.target: 註冊或刪除應用程式和共同作業 （例如憑證、 圖片、 虛擬人偶，以及文字描述） 的物件

trans-unit.source: Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet
trans-unit.target: 邀請的對等共同作業工作階段，包括範圍和用來識別它們在網際網路上的物件等項目

trans-unit.source: Allow peers to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut%2A> of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other
trans-unit.target: 允許對等<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut%2A>共同作業基礎結構管理清單的連絡人，或彼此發行它們的存在

trans-unit.source: Utilize <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SynchronizingObject%2A> properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects.
trans-unit.target: 利用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SynchronizingObject%2A>屬性和事件來協調非同步應用程式通訊，尤其是的名稱、 目前狀態、 應用程式或其他物件中的變更。

trans-unit.source: "Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms.
trans-unit.target: 「 連結-本機雲端 」、 「 子網路呼叫的對等 」，和 「 NearMe 範圍 」 都是同義字的詞彙。

trans-unit.source: "Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous.
trans-unit.target: 「 網際網路領域 」 和 「 無伺服器的目前狀態 」 的意義相同。

trans-unit.source: The site-local <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope> has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace.
trans-unit.target: 網站-本機<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpScope>有沒有對等共同作業的命名空間中。

trans-unit.source: The use of every method or property in this class requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 每個方法或屬性，這個類別中的使用，您需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 對等共同作業工作階段開始時，會建立此狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo" /> object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo" /> 物件，內含因遠端對等電腦的共同作業要求而啟動應用程式時所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If the application was started due to an invitation, a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo" /> object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式因邀請而啟動，就會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo" /> 物件，內含傳送該應用程式邀請的對等電腦相關資訊和邀請本身，否則傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是供共同作業感知<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>以判斷是否已啟動因為從遠端對等共同作業要求啟動後的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The calling application should inspect the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A> properties to get further information about the invitation request.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫的應用程式應該檢查<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Data%2A>和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationLaunchInfo.Message%2A>屬性，以取得進一步的邀請要求的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: Gets the persistent store that contains all <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> objects for remote peers.
trans-unit.target: 取得持續性存放區，內含遠端電腦的所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> object that contains all peer contact objects for remote peers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager" /> 物件，內含遠端對等電腦的所有對等連絡人物件。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to unregister.
trans-unit.target: 要取消註冊的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊與呼叫對等相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Peer objects are automatically unregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: 對等物件會自動取消註冊 （移除） 從對等共同作業基礎結構當物件的參考不再有效。

trans-unit.source: If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is unregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 如果呼叫端不會維護物件的參考，則對等共同作業基礎結構從取消註冊。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, an object can be manually unregistered by using this method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以手動使用此方法註冊物件。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerObject" /> parameter cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerObject" /> 參數不可為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Unable to complete <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject)" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 無法完成 <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject)" /> 作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> objects that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 取得在本機電腦上註冊之 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The caller required to sign in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method or prior to the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端才能登入對等共同作業基礎結構，透過<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>方法或使用這個方法之前。

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The following example code illustrates how to retrieve a collection of applications registered with the Collaboration infrastructure:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何擷取已註冊的共同作業基礎結構的應用程式集合：

trans-unit.source: Gets all <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> objects that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 取得在本機電腦上註冊的所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" /> that contains all applications that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" />，內含本機電腦上註冊的所有應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If an application is not found, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到應用程式，就會傳回大小為零 (0) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The caller is required to sign-in to the peer collaboration infrastructure via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端，才能登入對等共同作業基礎結構，透過<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>之前使用這個方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate the application registered to this peer.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法嘗試列舉註冊至這個對等電腦的應用程式時，傳回了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that all applications have valid registry values.
trans-unit.target: 請確認所有應用程式都有有效的登錄值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> to return for the specified application.
trans-unit.target: 要為指定的應用程式傳回的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> objects that are registered on the local machine for the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" />.
trans-unit.target: 為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />，取得本機電腦上註冊之所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" /> that contains all applications of the specified <paramref name="type" /> that are registered on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" />，內含註冊於本機電腦上且屬於指定 <paramref name="type" /> 的所有應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If an application is not found, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到應用程式，就會傳回大小為零 (0) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The caller is required to sign-in to the Peer Collaboration infrastructure via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to the use of this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端，才能登入對等共同作業基礎結構透過<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>之前使用這個方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取此方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not set to a known value in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 參數不是設定為 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> 列舉型別中已知的值。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate the application registered to this peer.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法嘗試列舉註冊至這個對等電腦的應用程式時，傳回了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that all applications have valid registry values.
trans-unit.target: 請確認所有應用程式都有有效的登錄值。

trans-unit.source: Obtains all <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances registered by the calling peer with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> infrastructure on this machine.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 執行個體，這些執行個體是由呼叫的對等電腦向這部電腦上的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 基礎結構註冊的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection" /> which contains all the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances registered by the calling peer with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> infrastructure on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection" />，內含所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 執行個體，這些執行個體是由呼叫的對等電腦向本機電腦 (Local Machine) 上的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 基礎結構註冊的。

trans-unit.source: If registered <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances are not discovered on the local machine, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果本機電腦上未找到已註冊的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 執行個體，則傳回大小為零 (0) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate all available <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法嘗試列舉所有可用的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 執行個體時，傳回了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of all the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> endpoints currently signed in on the network subnet of the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 傳回呼叫的對等電腦的網路子網路上，目前登入的所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 端點的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection" /> that contains all the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> endpoints currently signed into the 'Near Me' scope.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection" />，內含目前登入至 'Near Me' 範圍的所有 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 端點。

trans-unit.source: If peers are not discovered on the subnet, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果子網路上找不到對等電腦，則傳回大小為零 (0) 的集合。

trans-unit.source: The return of a fully populated <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection> via this method can require an indeterminate amount of time after sign-in depending on network topology and latency.
trans-unit.target: 傳回完整填入的<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMeCollection>透過此方法可要求未定登入之後根據網路拓撲和延遲的時間量。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to retrieve PeersNearMe as a PeerNearMeCollection:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明如何擷取 PeersNearMe PeerNearMeCollection 為：

trans-unit.source: The peer is not signed in to the 'Near Me' scope.
trans-unit.target: 對等電腦未登入 'Near Me' 範圍。

trans-unit.source: An invalid value was returned when this method attempted to enumerate all known People Near Me endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法嘗試列舉所有已知的「近端分享」端點時，傳回了無效的值。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" /> for the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: 會在本端主機上本機對等電腦的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationCollection" /> 變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與呼叫的對等電腦相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the name associated with the calling peer's endpoint (provided as the <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name" /> property).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，內含與呼叫的對等電腦端點相關聯的名稱 (端點由 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.Name" /> 屬性提供)。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Access to this property requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取這個屬性需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: Unable to set <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName" />.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName" />。

trans-unit.source: Raised when the name of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> on the local host for the local peer has changed.
trans-unit.target: 會在本機對等電腦本端主機上的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint" /> 名稱變更時引發。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection" /> for the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: 本端主機上本機對等電腦的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection" /> 已變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> of the local peer on the local host has changed.
trans-unit.target: 本端主機上本機對等電腦的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 已變更。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the presence for the calling peer within the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 基礎結構中，呼叫的對等電腦的顯示狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> that contains presence information for the calling peer that has registered for a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> session.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" />，內含已註冊 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 工作階段之呼叫對等電腦的顯示狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> cannot specify <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" /> 無法指定 <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus" /> is offline
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceStatus" /> 為離線

trans-unit.source: Unable to set <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" />
trans-unit.target: 無法設定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> for which to register the calling peer within the associated scope (global, local, and link-local).
trans-unit.target: 要在相關聯的範圍 (全域、區域或連結區域) 內註冊發出呼叫之對等的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of registration to perform.
trans-unit.target: 要執行的註冊類型。

trans-unit.source: The application may be registered for just the calling peer or for all peers using the machine.
trans-unit.target: 可以只針對發出呼叫的對等註冊應用程式，也可以針對使用該電腦的所有對等註冊應用程式。

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> for a collaboration session with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 針對與發出呼叫的對等進行共同作業工作階段註冊指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: The calling peer is required to sign in to the peer collaboration infrastructure with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A> method prior to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端的對等，才能登入對等共同作業基礎結構與<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn%2A>方法之前呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取此方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to register an application with the Collaboration infrastructure:
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將說明如何註冊應用程式與共同作業基礎結構：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Path" /> property on the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> object passed to <paramref name="application" /> is <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> 物件上傳遞到 <paramref name="application" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Path" /> 屬性為 <see langword="null." />。

trans-unit.source: The peer application instance provided has the same globally unique <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> as an application which is already registered.
trans-unit.target: 提供的對等應用程式執行個體具有與已註冊之應用程式相同的全域唯一 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" />。

trans-unit.source: The existing registration must be unregistered before a new application can be registered with the provided identifier.
trans-unit.target: 必須取消註冊現有的註冊，才能使用提供的識別項來註冊新的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="application" /> and <paramref name="type" /> parameters cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="application" /> 和 <paramref name="type" /> 參數不可以是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Both parameters must be specified.
trans-unit.target: 兩個參數都必須指定。

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not set to a known value in the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Type 參數未設定為 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> 列舉中的已知值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication,System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType)" /> operation cannot be completed until the caller has signed-in to the infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫者必須先登入基礎結構，<see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.RegisterApplication(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication,System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType)" /> 作業才能完成。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to register.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> associated with the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 註冊與呼叫對等相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: This method allows the object to be queried by remote peers participating in the scope in which the object was registered.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓物件參與的範圍的物件已登錄的遠端對等查詢。

trans-unit.source: If the object was previously registered, this method updates its registration.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前已註冊物件，這個方法會更新註冊。

trans-unit.source: If a registered object falls out of scope, it can be retrieved via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetLocalSetObjects%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果已註冊的物件超出範圍時，可以擷取透過<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.GetLocalSetObjects%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The size of the data portion of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> must be less than or equal to 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 資料部分大小<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>必須小於或等於 16384 個位元組。

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取此方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: Object already registered
trans-unit.target: 物件已註冊

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> cannot be <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 不可以是 <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject.Id" /> cannot be <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject.Id" /> 不可以是 <see langword="null." />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject)" /> operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject)" /> 作業無法完成。

trans-unit.source: The scope the peer is using to join the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 對等用來加入 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 活動的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Signs the peer into the collaboration infrastructure with the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> 將對等登入至共同作業基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: Display names are not necessarily unique.
trans-unit.target: 不一定是唯一的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by email, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該確認透過電子郵件、 使用顯示名稱的使用者的身分識別電話，或親自接受共同作業邀請之前。

trans-unit.source: This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 此函式會將使用者登入共同作業基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: Access to this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 存取此方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to sign the users into the Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何將使用者登入的共同作業基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="peerScope" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope.None" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerScope" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope.None" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerScope" /> parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerScope" /> 參數包含無效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope)" /> operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignIn(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope)" /> 作業無法完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> to which the calling peer can publish presence, capability and object information.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" />，呼叫的對等電腦可以對其發行顯示狀態、功能和物件資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> object that specifies the scope in which the calling peer will participate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> 物件，指定呼叫的對等電腦要參與的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes.
trans-unit.target: 對等的主機或主機應用程式可能會限制或使用不同的範圍的方式區分共同作業活動的對等電腦參與。

trans-unit.source: The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端的對等應該檢查以判斷哪些進一步的動作，它可以成功地執行這個方法的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: Scope enumeration specified by <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> 指定的範圍列舉。

trans-unit.source: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.
trans-unit.target: 將對等登出指定的範圍。

trans-unit.source: This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是應用程式特定的作業，而且登出，可能會影響其他可能在目前執行的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者尚未登入指定的範圍內呼叫此方法會不產生任何作用。

trans-unit.source: When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> endpoint object set.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者登出近端分享時，其已發行的資訊都會從刪除<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>端點物件集。

trans-unit.source: This includes <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceInfo%2A>, in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 這包括<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalEndPointName%2A>和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceInfo%2A>，除了任何呼叫端的對等共同作業基礎結構中註冊的物件識別。

trans-unit.source: Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: 此資訊會被刪除，因為它不再提供給遠端對等電腦或對等共同作業的主機。

trans-unit.source: From the perspective of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 觀點的<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>類別，其他共用相同的信任的連絡人資訊無關; 使用<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>類別不會影響其他物件中的這項資訊永續性，例如遠端對等<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>物件。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, deleting a peer from the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，刪除從對等<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager>不會影響在共同作業應用程式; 它是否存在其他連絡人是仍然可以檢視其目前狀態和與其共同作業。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="peerScope" /> parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="peerScope" /> 參數包含無效的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope)" /> operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SignOut(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope)" /> 作業無法完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the event handler callback object for all event handlers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所有事件處理常式的事件處理常式回呼物件。

trans-unit.source: An object with <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> implemented on it, to be used for application thread synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 已實作 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> 的物件，將用於應用程式執行緒同步處理。

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的預設值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> to unregister for the calling peer.
trans-unit.target: 要針對呼叫對等取消註冊的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of deregistration to perform for either the calling peer or for all peers that exist on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 為存在電腦的呼叫對等或所有對等執行的取消註冊類型。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> from the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration" /> 基礎結構取消註冊指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" />。

trans-unit.source: Unregistering a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it.
trans-unit.target: 正在移除註冊<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>呼叫的對等用戶端接收的共同作業邀請，它就會停止。

trans-unit.source: If the application being unregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前未註冊已解除登錄應用程式，這不是任何作業。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法需要<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>的<xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted>。

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: 此狀態時，會建立<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>共同作業工作階段開始。

trans-unit.source: The globally unique <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> for the specified application does not exist or is empty.
trans-unit.target: 指定應用程式的全域唯一 <see cref="P:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication.Id" /> 不存在或者是空的。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="application" /> or <paramref name="type" /> parameter is set to <see langword="null." />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="application" /> 或 <paramref name="type" /> 參數設為 <see langword="null." />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter is not set to a known value in <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 參數未設為 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType" /> 中的已知值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication,System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType)" /> operation could not be completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.UnregisterApplication(System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication,System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplicationRegistrationType)" />作業無法完成。
